'''1.6.4 Build 15<ref>{{Link|url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/82079717876/minecraftedu-development-update-alias-protection|title=MinecraftEdu Development Update: Alias Protection|website=Tumblr|date=April 8, 2014}}</ref>''' is the fifteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released on April 8, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==
* Added alias protection for servers.
** Disabled by default.
* You can then password protect aliases in the server as you login with your client.
* List of protected aliases and their matching encrypted passwords are stored in the <code>servertool/settings/reserved_aliases.ini</code> file.
* Passwords are encrypted with MD5.
* Idle kick functionality.
** Disabled by default. It can be enabled by modifying a existing server's <code>idle-kick</code> parameters in <code>serverwizardsettings.ini</code>
